title: Found a fix for High Sierra Mac Users (FPS Problem)
body: So this is just a temporary fix for Mac's it went from being unplayable to just being able to play again the game will now run from 55 fps - 62 Fps the only thing you have to do is put vertical sync on which is in you game settings when you are in game. I use to be able to play league in between like from like high 80's fps to low 60's so there is still something the riot needs to figure out but thats the best way to cope with it for now.

replies.body: Glad you were able to find something that works for the time being! V-sync isn't something that we usually suggest right off the bat since usually fps issues involve drivers as well, but definite props for trying to help out your fellow players ^_^
